General.Name: Dosni Roha Indonesia Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Dosni Roha Indonesia Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, provides taxi and other related services in Indonesia. The company operates through Taxi Service, Gas Fuel, Medical Equipment Trade, and Others segments. It also sells gas fuels; and distributes pharmaceutical and medical equipment. The company was formerly known as PT Zebra Nusantara Tbk and changed its name to PT Dosni Roha Indonesia Tbk in March 2022. PT Dosni Roha Indonesia Tbk was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. The company operates as a subsidiary of PT Trinity Healthcare.
